name: Spook Me
description:
Description:

This game was submitted to The Spooktober Jam

Spook me is a local multiplayer game inspired by Prop Hunt where a group of ghost must hide theirselves into mansion objects to avoid being catched by a ghost hunter.

Controls:

Hunter

  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to aim
  • Right trigger to shoot

Ghost

  • Left stick to move
  • A to transform
